title: Assault on human dignity
brief_description: An IFAG report by Kurt Bethge which investigates to political maneuvering in the Soviet occupied zone of Germany which led to the erection of the Berlin Wall, and how this affected the people in West Berlin, when world attention was focussed on those in East Berlin.
